attributes.action: Keep flu jab for at-risk only, or it won't work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the commercial sale of flu vaccinations. Keep it for the at risk groups only such as the elderly and those with medical conditions. The overuse by hypochondriacs will lead to resistant strains.
Companies like Boots buying up the supply often means GP surgeries can't get the jabs in time to be effective.
